comment: It was known as the National Movement Simeon II (Bulgarian: Национално движение „Симеон Втори“, romanized: Natsionalno dvizhenie „Simeon Vtori“) until 3 June 2007
The same party as RUTO but RUTO was its former name which was changed to RUBGWC.
ATAKA, COALAP, AP, NOA, these are all abbreviations for the same party - ATAKA party.
Since 2019 parties GERB and UDF are in alliance.
